snippet.title: 4th PV 「RE Aoharu」 Piano & KR Ver. (Subtitled) / Blue Archive Final Chapter OST "Theme 59"
snippet.description:
Blue Archive - 4th PV「RE Aoharu」 OST "Theme 59" Piano Performance (Korean Ver.)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* The official Korean version of the video and narration was added to the remastered performance of the existing work.
* In the case of the voice, there was no original source, so I extracted it manually.
  There are some unnatural parts in the process of refining the voice.
* The performance was performed as a duet, but only the main piano was included in the video.
  Because the sub piano part is used in the form of a loop station
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Finally, the history of "the final episode" has been written on the Korean (global) server!!
When we first broadcasted on the Japanese server to celebrate our 2nd anniversary
Great things have happened all at once, and that time is coming for us now!!

With a meaningful anniversary, the release of the '4th PV', the 'Mika', and the animation production decision!! A great thing happened at the same time...
I still can't believe it... It's more surprising than the Genshin Impact
  
However, there is really shocking news in Korean broadcast today.
The point is that dubbing is added with Korean voices!
It's something I wasn't expecting, but I'm thrilled.

In addition, this performance video is also released along with the official Korean version
The middle "student council president's narration" was dubbed into the Korean version and shown ㅠㅠ The best..

This performance is the fourth PV song that contains the final episode of Blue Archive's main story.
By rearranging the OST "Aoharu" that announces the beginning of the existing main story,
It came to appear with "RE Aoharu" decorating the end.

I added a bit more piano color to the basic music,
I played it with a little bit of my heart along with the feeling of the original song "Aoharu" haha

Blue Archive, I will continue to support you!

Thank you for listening.

---------------------------------------------------
Discord Channel : https://discord.gg/TGvwJR9rs7
Twitch Streaming : https://www.twitch.tv/frost_piano
---------------------------------------------------
Blue Archive Half anniversary Special Piano Performance : https://youtu.be/fpx-GuZ0nU0
Blue Archive Main Title OST 「Constant Moderato」 Piano Play : https://youtu.be/qOGJzArDknQ
[1st Anniversary] Blue Archive 「Target For Love」 Piano & Guitar Ver. : https://youtu.be/fC7HWUYQLdQ 

---------------------------------------------------
템플릿 : 론박자막연구소
---------------------------------------------------

#BlueArchive #블루아카이브 #ブルーアーカイブ #ブルアカ
